document_data.name: Embassy of Procampur
document_data.mainbody: The '''Embassy of Procampur''' was an embassy of the city of [[Procampur]] located in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Description: The embassy was found at the south end of the Foreign District in Ravens Bluff, where a looping side-lane provided access. It was surrounded by a wooded garden illuminated by lamps of ruby and emerald colors on dry evenings, in which visitors could wander freely.
document_data.Activities: The Embassy of Procampur held frequent parties all through the year, drawing a large number of visitors and guests. These were mainly [[merchant]]s and veteran [[adventurer]]s considering moving to Procampur. They often explored the gardens, talked, and made various deals.
